short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Universal account authenticator for EOSIO blockchains, powered by Telos' official Sqrl wallet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Telos Authenticator (Sqrl) for EOSIO blockchains is a Chrome extension that adopts the EOSIO Universal Authenticator Library standard for signing transactions securely.
